snippet.title: [TRAILER] OROBOROS
snippet.description:
The store page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2160440/Oroboros/

This game was made for a game jam in 48h
We want to make him greater and greater and add a lot of contents like dragon taming, quests, NPC, more island, sky fight with flying boat, construction, crafting, full wonderful story

Oroboros is a RPG game where you are a sky’s pirate. The world as been shattered by an Oroboros, a mystical creature burried under the earth. Against all odds humanity survived, this event has awoken earth true power, the mountain stones!!! 500 years later, Oroboros still swim in the earth core. Every 10 seconds Oroboros rotation around the core is throwing wave of heat in all directions.

Go explore this new world, talk to people, get quests and finish them, kill NPC, grab some good stuffs to survive.

You will take control of a sky's pirate who crashed on an floating island and who need to explore to find a way out. Every 10 seconds you will have a wave of heat that will make loose life. Try to survive by finding item to heal. You will be attacked by monster, try to escape or fight them.
Find quest and NPC, but don't forget DON'T FALL FROM THE ISLAND


[Follow US]

►Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/blackpotion
►Site : https://blackpotion.fr
►Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbKJ...
►Facebook : http://facebook.com/BlackPotionHq
►Twitter : http://twitter.com/blackpotionhq
►Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/blackpotionhq
►Discord : https://discordapp.com/invite/YvEmFc5
►Itch.io : https://blackpotion.itch.io/
